abstract: John Bieker is shot and killed during botched robbery at his Shawnee, Kan, gun shop She's a Pistol.
lead_paragraph: A gun shop owner in suburban Kansas City died from gunshot wounds after a botched robbery Friday left three suspects wounded.
snippet: A gun shop owner in suburban Kansas City died from gunshot wounds after a botched robbery Friday left three suspects wounded.

headline.main: Kansas: Owner Killed in Robbery at Gun Shop
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Owner Killed in Robbery at Gun Shop
